summary: I am a Research Engineer at Qualcomm Technologies, focusing on applications of Deep Learning to combinatorial optimization problems. I hold a PhD from both Sapienza University of Rome and ENS Paris. I have a strong background both in mathematical and computational methods, with extensive experience in performing and reporting scientific research through publications and seminars. I authored a book and several publications on international journals. I also taught physics to students at the BSc and PhD candidate level.
